description: GameStatus ist ein intuitiever, einfach zu bedienender, Discord Bot. Er zeigt dir Statistiken über deine Spiele Server an, unterstützt über 250 verschiedene Spiele, um dir immer Echtzeit Statistiken bieten zu können.

premiumPage.description: For those who want to support the development of GameStatus, you can purchase a premium subscription for a small monthly fee. Premium can also be obtained through our points system, by upvoting our bot for free twice a day. Alternatively, a paid alternative is available to those who wish to support Nexeum Studios further, or do not wish to upvote the bot.
premiumPage.perks: Premium currently offers 2 perks, more will be added in the future:
premiumPage.perk2: - Manually refresh the status of your instances with a button
premiumPage.redeemPointsDescription: You need at least 2 points to redeem premium. You currently have {points}.
premiumPage.redeemPointsEarn: Earn points by voting for our bot on Top.GG, each vote is worth 1 point.
premiumPage.redeemDM: You have redeemed {days} days of premium for {points} points. Your code is {code}.
